summary.content: Responsible retirement and lifecycle management of the inquiry outcomes.
summary.title: Objective

keyDeliverables: Phase F Stewardship Plan and Disposal Protocol.

jtbdAnalysis.coreJobStory: When my mission concludes, help me ensure the system is responsibly managed or retired, so I can fulfill my long-term obligations to stakeholders.

practitioner.job: Manage the responsible transition of the system to its final state.

nasa_registry.requirement: The system shall define long-term stewardship and disposal plans per Section G.1.

name: System Stewardship
principle: To ensure the lifecycle integrity of the system through transition and closeout.
keyQuestion: How do we ensure long-term sustainability and responsible disposal?
